content:
image.png

This is how my improvement to E0015 looks like. Let me know if I should change anything!

The only thing I'd love to add is somehow mention why PartialEq::eq is being called, since there's no call in the code written by the user. I would likely try to add a secondary span_label pointing at the match and say something along the lines "std::cmp::PartialEq::eq called because it is used for pattern matching" when appropriate, but if it is too hard to recognize that that is the case, it's not a problem it can be follow up work :)
